migrations.description: Updates release version config based on the breaking changes in Nx v22
migrations.name: 22-0-0-release-version-config-changes

migrations.description: Consolidates releaseTag* options into nested releaseTag object structure
migrations.name: 22-0-0-consolidate-release-tag-config

migrations.description: Updates the nx wrapper.
migrations.name: 22-1-0-update-nx-wrapper

migrations.description: Updates webpack-based SSR configuration to use preserve module format and bundler module resolution.
migrations.name: update-ssr-webpack-config-22-2-0

migrations.description: Update 'module' to 'preserve' and 'moduleResolution' to 'bundler' in TypeScript configurations for Angular projects.
migrations.name: update-module-resolution-22-2-0

migrations.description: Updates the 'lib' property in tsconfig files to use 'es2022' or a more modern version.
migrations.name: update-typescript-lib-22-2-0

migrations.description: Update 'vitest' unit test runner option to 'vitest-analog' in generator defaults.
migrations.name: update-unit-test-runner-option

migrations.description: Set 'isolatedModules' to 'true' in TypeScript test configurations for Angular projects.
migrations.name: set-isolated-modules-22-3-0

migrations.description: Replace 'jest-preset-angular/setup-jest' imports with the new 'setupZoneTestEnv' function.
migrations.name: update-jest-preset-angular-setup

migrations.description: Convert jest.config.ts files from ESM to CJS syntax (export default -> module.exports, import -> require) for projects using CommonJS resolution to ensure correct loading under Node.js type-stripping.
migrations.name: convert-jest-config-to-cjs

migrations.description: Replace removed matcher aliases in Jest v30 with their corresponding matcher
migrations.name: replace-removed-matcher-aliases-v22-3

migrations.description: Renames `cy.exec().its('code')` usages to the new `exitCode` property introduced in Cypress v15.
migrations.name: rename-cy-exec-code-property

migrations.description: Updates the deprecated `Cypress.SelectorPlayground` API to `Cypress.ElementSelector` and removes the unsupported `onElement` option.
migrations.name: update-selector-playground-api

migrations.description: For Angular component testing projects below v18, switches to the fallback `@cypress/angular` harness required by Cypress v15.
migrations.name: update-angular-component-testing-support

migrations.description: Converts the entire application to block control flow syntax
migrations.name: control-flow-migration

migrations.description: Replaces usages of the deprecated Router.getCurrentNavigation method with the Router.currentNavigation signal
migrations.name: router-current-navigation

migrations.description: Ensures that the Router.lastSuccessfulNavigation signal is now invoked
migrations.name: router-last-successful-navigation

migrations.description: Moves imports of `ApplicationConfig` from `@angular/platform-browser` to `@angular/core`
migrations.name: application-config-core

migrations.description: Adds `BootstrapContext` to `bootstrapApplication` calls in `main.server.ts` to support server rendering.
migrations.name: add-bootstrap-context-to-server-main

migrations.description: Migrates deprecated bootstrap options to providers.
migrations.name: bootstrap-options-migration
